src:
Juventus Segera Perpanjang Kontrak Wojciech Szczesny
01 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Juara Serie A, Juventus diberitakan sangat puas dengan performa yang ditunjukkan Wojciech Szczesny. Tim asal Turin itu diberitakan akan menyodorkan kontrak baru untuk sang kiper.
Szczesny sendiri pertama kali bergabung dengan Juventus pada tahun 2017 silam. Ia direkrut dari Arsenal, setelah ia dua musim dipinjamkan ke AS Roma.
Sempat menjadi kiper kedua Juventus, kini Szczesny naik pangkat menjadi kiper utama Juventus tahun lalu. Sejak saat itu ia selalu dipercaya untuk mengawal gawang Si Nyonya Tua.
Dilansir Gazzetta Dello Sport, Manajemen Juventus sangat puas dengan kinerja Szczesny. Untuk itu mereka berencana memperpanjang kontrak kiper asal Polandia tersebut.

Simak situasi perpanjangan kontrak Szczesny di bawah ini.
text:
Juventus will soon extend Wojciech Szczesny's contract
Nov 01 2019, 22:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Serie A champions Juventus are reported to be very satisfied with the performance shown by Wojciech Szczesny. The Turin-based team were reported to be offering a new contract for the goalkeeper.
Szczesny himself first joined Juventus in 2017. He was recruited from Arsenal after two seasons on loan at AS Roma.
Had become the second goalkeeper of Juventus, now Szczesny was promoted to become the main goalkeeper of Juventus last year. Since then he has always been trusted to guard the Old Lady's goal.
Reported by Gazzetta Dello Sport, Juventus Management is very satisfied with Szczesny's performance. For that they plan to extend the contract from the Polish goalkeeper.

Check out the situation of Szczesny's contract extension below.
